StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMarketAnalysis]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @FiscalYear as integer, @All as bit
AS SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED IF @All = 1 BEGIN SELECT cp.[CollegePro.leID],cp.[SCHOOL_CODE]AS SchoolCode, hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, hs.rowguid as SchoolGuid, FiscalYear,PriorityCode AS Priority, cp.BarronsIndex AS BarronIndex, NumMale, NumFemale, NumAfricanAmerican, NumHispanic, --need to .x these zeroes NumOther, Case when (isnull(NumMale,0) + isnull(NumFemale,0) + isnull(NumAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumHispanic,0) + isnull(NumOther,0)) = 0 Then 0 Else (isnull(NumQCPMale,0) + isnull(NumQCPFemale,0) + isnull(NumQCPAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumQCPHispanic,0) + isnull(NumQCPOther,0))/(isnull(NumMale,0) + isnull(NumFemale,0) + isnull(NumAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumHispanic,0) + isnull(NumOther,0)) End as PercentQuali.ed, (isnull(NumQCPMale,0) + isnull(NumQCPFemale,0) + isnull(NumQCPAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumQCPHispanic,0) + isnull(NumQCPOther,0)) AS NumQCP, (isnull(NumMale,0) + isnull(NumFemale,0) + isnull(NumAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumHispanic,0) + isnull(NumOther,0)) AS NumDQCP, 0 AS NumPool, 0 AS NumAEV, DistanceToCollege,TimeToCollegeInMinutes, cvd.[NumVisitsPlanned] AS NumFYPlannedVisits, cvd.[ContractGoal] AS NumFYContractGoal
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd ON cp.[CollegePro.leID] = cvd.[CollegePro.leID] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].High_School hs on cp.school_code = hs.school_code and hs.school_type <> 'HS' --and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear where hs.Organiza.on_ID = @Organiza.onID and (cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear-1 OR cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear - 2 OR cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear - 3)
END ELSE begin SELECT cp.[CollegePro.leID],cp.[SCHOOL_CODE]AS SchoolCode, hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, hs.rowguid as SchoolGuid, FiscalYear,PriorityCode AS Priority, cp.BarronsIndex AS BarronIndex, NumMale, NumFemale, NumAfricanAmerican, NumHispanic, --need to .x these zeroes NumOther, Case when (isnull(NumMale,0) + isnull(NumFemale,0) + isnull(NumAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumHispanic,0) + isnull(NumOther,0)) = 0 Then 0 Else (isnull(NumQCPMale,0) + isnull(NumQCPFemale,0) + isnull(NumQCPAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumQCPHispanic,0) + isnull(NumQCPOther,0))/(isnull(NumMale,0) + isnull(NumFemale,0) + isnull(NumAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumHispanic,0) + isnull(NumOther,0)) End as PercentQuali.ed, (isnull(NumQCPMale,0) + isnull(NumQCPFemale,0) + isnull(NumQCPAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumQCPHispanic,0) + isnull(NumQCPOther,0)) AS NumQCP, (isnull(NumMale,0) + isnull(NumFemale,0) + isnull(NumAfricanAmerican,0) + isnull(NumHispanic,0) + isnull(NumOther,0)) AS NumDQCP, 0 AS NumPool, 0 AS NumAEV, DistanceToCollege,TimeToCollegeInMinutes, cvd.[NumVisitsPlanned] AS NumFYPlannedVisits, cvd.[ContractGoal] AS NumFYContractGoal
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd ON cp.[CollegePro.leID] = cvd.[CollegePro.leID] INNER JOIN [dbo].High_School hs on cp.school_code = hs.school_code and hs.school_type <> 'HS' --and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear where hs.Organiza.on_ID = @Organiza.onID and (cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear-1 OR cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear - 2 OR cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear - 3)
ORDER BY cp.[PriorityCode],cp.[SCHOOL_CODE]
END
--ALTER PROCEDURE [USMC].[GetMarketAnalysis] -- @SchoolCode as Integer, -- @FiscalYear as Integer -- -- --AS --SET NOCOUNT ON -- -- SELECT -- [CollegePro.leID], cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, -- hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, -- [BarronsIndex],[PriorityCode], -- [NumMale],[NumFemale],[NumAfricanAmerican], -- [NumHispanic],[NumOther],[NumQCPMale],[NumQCPFemale], -- [NumQCPAfricanAmerican],[NumQCPHispanic], -- [NumQCPOther], -- --[PoolInfo is Missing], -- [DistanceToCollege], -- [TimeToCollegeInMinutes] -- -- FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp -- INNER JOIN [dbo].High_School hs ON cp.school_code = hs.school_code -- -- -- WHERE cp.SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode -- -- return the data for last three .scal year from the selected .scal year -- AND (cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear -- OR cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear - 1 -- OR cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear - 2) -- -- --GROUP BY cp.FiscalYear, PriorityCode -- ORDER BY cp.FiscalYear, PriorityCode -- --ORDER BY cp.[PriorityCode] -- ----- CLEAN UP --SET NOCOUNT OFF
